bs-whoisonline-desc: Displays a list of users who are currently online
bs-whoisonline-pref-maxidletime: Time in seconds until a user is marked as offline:
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinecount-desc: Shows the number of all users who have been logged in within the last 10 minutes.
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinepopup-desc: Shows all users who have been logged in within the last 10 minutes.
bs-whoisonline-pref-interval-help: The list of users is upated every x seconds.
bs-whoisonline-pref-maxidletime-help: After this time in seconds without activity, a user is considered offline.
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinecount-desc: Shows the number of users who have logged in within the last 10 minutes
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinepopup-desc: Shows all users who have been logged in within the last 10 minutes. The output is a speech bubble when a user hovers over the related link
